_header: Listeneth lordings both young and old / Of the French men that were so proud and bold
Title(s): The Song about the Flemish Insurrection
_description: The Song about the Flemish Insurrection — 136 lines in 8-line stanzas (aaabcccb)

BLHar2253.First Lines:
Lystneþ lordinges boþe ȝonge ant olde Of þe
                    freynshe men þat were so proude ant bolde…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…bote he þe raþere þer of wolle do bote wel
                    sore hit shal hym rewe
